channel.title: preferences on Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in preferences on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Settings
item.description: Enter key/value environment variables to use in Postman API requests. Cancel Save Cancel Save Login Add Custom Environment Variable Environment Variables Delete const loginDialog = document.getElementById("loginDialog") let accountSidKeyElement = loginDialog.querySelector( "[modal-account-sid-key]" ) let accountSidValueElement = loginDialog.querySelector( "[modal-account-sid-value]" ) let authTokenKeyElement = loginDialog.querySelector("[modal-auth-token-key]") let authTokenValueElement = loginDialog.querySelector( "[modal-auth-token-value]" ) const newEnvVarDialog = document.getElementById("newEnvVarDialog") let keyElement = newEnvVarDialog.
